description: Details required for Conditions 5 (Cycle Parking), 6 (Construction Management Plan), 10 (Landscaping Scheme) and 16 (Fire Safety Strategy) of planning permission 23/01536/FUL (Variation of Condition Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to carry out development without compliance with Condition 1 (Approved Plans) of Planning permission 22/00304/FUL (Erection of two storey single family dwelling with roof accommodation and basement with associated amenity space, off street parking, perimetre wall, electric access gates, cycle storage and refuse/recycling store) to allow minor modifications on approved plans and elevations.)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The submitted Fire Safety Statement does not include all of the relevant details to satisfy policy D12A of the London Plan (2021) and only includes limited/generic basic information with insufficient detail or plans, specific to the site/development. It therefore does not demonstrate that the development would be safe for its lifetime and, as such, Condition 16 cannot be discharged.

Inadequate information has been provided with regards to Condition 10 (Landscaping) of planning permission 23/01536/FUL. Therefore, the proposal would fail to ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

In the absence of detailed drawings and information demonstrating that secure and enclosed cycle parking facilities are being provided on-site to promote sustainable transport, the details are considered insufficient to discharge Conditions 5 (Cycle Parking) of 23/01536/FUL and contrary to policy T5 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS6 and DM8 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
